name: Poor Piggy
description:
The game for LudumDare45:  Start with nothing.  We did this game as a team.  

A Piggy Bank who wants to be a real Pig.

Looking to the Pig Farm. But he needs money!!

Help Mr. Piggy Bank to Collect enough money to quit to house for Pig Farm.

He is just a Poor Piggy.

HOW TO PLAY? 

Move with WASD. Rush with long press W.  Collect the money for the farm for piggy bank's dream.

CREDITS

Gizem Kara & Cengizhan Şişman -> Graphics and Models

Tolga Durman & Hasan Vurucu & Ekin Nohutçu -> Coding

Hasan Vurucu -> Music and Sounds

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/poor-piggy
